title: A Reason to Love
description: Dr. David Ravell is the best in his field, but he’s competing with Dr. Lonnie Walsh for surgeries… and love.
quote: You’re a good doctor, but you’re not David Ravell.
altHero: a doctor with furrowed brow and two beautiful nurses
alt1: a doctor in a surgical cap and mask
alt2: medical staff around an operating table
alt4: an older man in doctor’s coat smiling like a proud mentor
